title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5009.1 - Automatic vesting for members with a date of membership prior to July 27, 1976
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5009.1 - Automatic vesting for members with a date of membership prior to July 27, 1976

State Regulations
A member of the system who is eligible to vest and fails to
file an election to do so shall be deemed to have filed it the day before his
membership would cease and shall be automatically vested. Such member may apply
for a deferred retirement allowance when eligible. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5009.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
